trends: There have been 72 other sightings in Nashville
There were 2 other sightings in Nashville on or around January 21st 2009
Summary: Large bright slow moving lighted object.
divs: Sighting DetailsThis evening at 7:40 pm (Jan. 21, 2009) I stepped out onto my deck for my night vigil of sky watch and observed a large-bright slow moving white light slowly moving north-easterly from the south-west. The wife stepped out seconds after I first noticed the light and soon we were both watching as it slowly approached our area. I estimate the light to have been at least 8 to 10,000 ft. as judged by local air traffic in and out of Nashville. A departing airliner passed over our house and was headed west in the vicinity of the object (light). The object slowly began to fade it���s light as the airliner approached till it completely faded out. The airliner flew past the area but the object never reappeared. I am seeing these anomalous night lights with frequent observations this month. A consistent observation I have made is that these lighted objects will fade with approaching aircraft and will suddenly appear when there is no air traffic in the vicinity.
